title: Sent to desktop after champ select?
body:
Every time i start a game the client closes after champ select but instead of loading the game it just sits on the desktop. I can open the client and click reconnect but it just goes straight to desktop again.

There is no error messages or connection problem messages at all, I also have no firewall enabled.

I tried reinstalling League yesterday which seemed to fix it then, but not permanently it seems.

Anyone having the same issue, i feel bad for the teammates I've abandoned in these games.

replies.body:
Nice summoner name, though I disagree with the implied "ownership" of horses.

First, I would suggest trying custom games until you've got this problem fixed. What OS are you on, and which ISP are you with? Do you have any form of anti-virus/firewall?

Hi HORSE OF FORCE, thanks for they reply.

I'm running Windows 7 Home Premium, and with Telstra ADSL2. I have disabled my firewall and Microsoft Security Essentials while trying to fix this problem, with no results so far :/.

*The game in question finally ended, trying in a custom also sends me to desktop.

>Microsoft Security Essentials

Woah, ain't that a really old and unsupported piece of security software for Windows XP? You really should uninstall that and use proper protection. Unless that's just what you're calling Window's current security tools. The features have been integrated into the OS now, leaving the installable program in the dust.

Ok, here's what I want you to do. Open Task Manager (usually Ctrl+Shift+Esc, Ctrl+Alt+Del if that doesn't work) and find where League is currently sitting (just in client form, not in game) in your **Processes** tab. Sort by alphabetical to make sure it doesn't jump anywhere. Then, start up a custom game and attempt to enter it. Watch what happens in your Task Manager. What should happen is two more executables for League will open and one will steal your focus, which is the game. If what you see happening is those two executables open and then one of them immediately closes/freezes, then that means it's the game crashing, which means that it could either be a connection issue or just general crashing.

[This page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) will help if it's a crash, and [this page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will help if it's a connection issue.

Best of luck.

When i open the client there is 3 processes; LolClient.exe, LoLLauncher.exe and LoLpatcher.exe. When attempting to join the game, the processes stay the same, none are opening or closing. I will try the fixes on both pages to see if anything works.

Thank you :)
I'd suggest you do a straight up reinstall of the entire game. Make sure to back up your item sets and config!

Tried repairing the game and now it just crashes after clicking launch instead of waiting till after champ select. There is numerous threads working around this issue though so will hopefully be able to solve it soon.
